title: Haunts (1976, Horror) by Herb Freed | with May Britt, Cameron Mitchell | Movie

sources.title: Haunts (1976, Horror) by Herb Freed | with May Britt, Cameron Mitchell | Movie
sources.description:
0The haunts from her past become the horrors of the present....
Ingrid is a seemingly innocent farm girl convinced that her slovenly uncle is the man responsible for the bloody scissor-murders of several local girls.

Original title: Haunts (1976)

This film is subtitled in many language options
 
Director: Herb Freed
Writers: Anne Marisse, Herb Freed
Stars: May Britt, Cameron Mitchell, Aldo Ray
Genres: Cult Film, Horror, Thriller


0:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
19:34 A group encounters a mysterious figure and discusses unusual occurrences late at night.
21:38 Eerie events unfolding in a small town, involving a mysterious attacker and a sense of impending danger.
32:28 A mysterious encounter leads to a series of events involving dancing, relationships, and misunderstandings.
54:22 A haunting tale of confession and forgiveness unfolds in a small town church.
55:47 Investigation into a mysterious man's identity leads to unexpected revelations and confrontations.
1:08:37 Investigation reveals a murderer's past, leading to suspicion and fear among the community.
1:25:17 Investigation reveals shocking truth about Ingrid's family history and tragic events.
